content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals e to the power of t"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mi>t</mi></msup></math>, and the function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals 7 ln t"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>ln</mi><mi>t</mi></math>. If the function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses f circle g close parentheses open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo>âˆ˜</mo><mi>g</mi></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math>, which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math>, for <math alttext="t greater than 0"><mi>t</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="t e to the power of 7"><mi>t</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mn>7</mn></msup></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
